request.html:
data [required]

object

Data object for creating a web integration account.

attributes [required]

object

Attributes for creating a web integration account.

name [required]

string

The name of the account.

secrets [required]

object

Sensitive credentials for the account. The structure and required fields vary by integration type. These values are write-only and never returned in responses. Use the schema endpoint to determine which secret fields are required for your specific integration.

settings [required]

object

Integration-specific settings for the account. The structure and required fields vary by integration type. Use the schema endpoint (GET /api/v2/web-integrations/{integration_name}/accounts/schema) to retrieve the specific requirements for your integration before creating an account.

type [required]

enum

The JSON:API type for web integration accounts. Allowed enum values: Account

default: Account

api_key_token.description: Twilio API Key Secret (token) corresponding to the API Key SID. Keep this secure as it provides authentication access.

account_sid.description: Twilio Account SID that uniquely identifies your Twilio account. Found in Twilio Console > Account Info.

alerts.description: Enable collection of Twilio Alerts logs to monitor account alerts and notifications.

api_key.description: Twilio API Key SID for authentication. Create from Twilio Console > Account > API Keys & Tokens.

call_summaries.description: Enable collection of Twilio Voice call summaries to track voice call performance and metadata.

ccm_enabled.description: Enable Cloud Cost Management to monitor Twilio usage costs and identify optimization opportunities.

censor_logs.description: Enable censoring of sensitive data in logs. When true, phone numbers and SMS message bodies are censored for privacy.

events.description: Enable collection of Twilio Events logs to monitor account-level events and activities.

messages.description: Enable collection of Twilio Messages logs to track SMS and messaging activity.

200.html:
$schema [required]

string

The JSON Schema version URI.

additionalProperties

boolean

Whether additional properties are allowed at the root level (typically false).

properties [required]

object

The properties object containing settings and secrets schema definitions. Both are always present in every integration schema.

secrets [required]

object

JSON Schema definition for the secrets object. Contains sensitive credentials required for the integration such as API keys, tokens, and passwords. These values are write-only and never returned in responses.

additionalProperties

boolean

Whether additional properties are allowed (typically false).

properties

object

The individual secret fields for this integration. Field names and types vary by integration.

<any-key>

object

JSON Schema definition for a single field within settings or secrets. The exact fields vary by integration.

additionalProperties

boolean

Whether additional properties are allowed for this field.

default

Default value for the field if not provided.

description

string

Human-readable description of the field's purpose.

items

object

Schema for array items when type is "array".

minLength

int64

Minimum length for string fields.

type

string

The data type of the field (string, boolean, integer, array, object).

required

[string]

List of required secret field names.

type

string

Always "object" for the secrets container.

settings [required]

object

JSON Schema definition for the settings object. Contains integration-specific configuration fields such as account identifiers, feature toggles, and non-sensitive configuration options.

additionalProperties

boolean

Whether additional properties are allowed (typically false).

properties

object

The individual setting fields for this integration. Field names and types vary by integration.

<any-key>

object

JSON Schema definition for a single field within settings or secrets. The exact fields vary by integration.

additionalProperties

boolean

Whether additional properties are allowed for this field.

default

Default value for the field if not provided.

description

string

Human-readable description of the field's purpose.

items

object

Schema for array items when type is "array".

minLength

int64

Minimum length for string fields.

type

string

The data type of the field (string, boolean, integer, array, object).

required

[string]

List of required setting field names.

type

string

Always "object" for the settings container.

required [required]

[string]

List of required top-level properties.

type [required]

string

The root type of the schema (always "object").

request.html:
data [required]

object

Data object for updating a web integration account.

attributes

object

Attributes for updating a web integration account. All fields are optional - only provide the fields you want to update. Partial updates are supported, allowing you to modify specific settings or secrets without providing all fields.

name

string

The name of the account.

secrets

object

Sensitive credentials to update. Only the secrets provided will be updated. These values are write-only and never returned in responses.

settings

object

Integration-specific settings to update. Only the fields provided will be updated. The structure varies by integration type. Refer to the integration's schema for available fields.

type [required]

enum

The JSON:API type for web integration accounts. Allowed enum values: Account

default: Account
